storyInfo: Robin's ambush fails, but the tower is ultimately activated. With a roar, it sinks into the ground. And in the darkness, Robin and Anthony have a talk.

attributes.content: Urgh, god dammit, where in the world did my card key go...
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Did I flush it while taking a dump?
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Chief Barton, what's wrong?
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: Mind your own business!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Y-Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: Tsk, stuck-up asshole...
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: I'm guessing... someone probably pissed him off.
attributes.name: Jailer B

attributes.content: Heh, probably Anthony.
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: I don't really know what's going on, but it seems like someone's trying to kill him.
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: Barton likes to brag about how perfect the prison is. This is gonna keep him on tenterhooks.
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: We're prison guards, you know.
attributes.name: Jailer B

attributes.content: Eh, it's not someone getting killed that I'm happy about. I just like seeing him so peeved.
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: Besides, let's be honest. We've seen Randal and Barton do so much dirty work over the years.
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: If you ask me, I think Randal knows who sent these hitmen in here. He's just turning a blind eye because he's in their pocket.
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Jailer B

attributes.content: Gah...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Don't move, Robin.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Don't make me kill you.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Well, damn, Robin. You're good. Even I didn't have you pegged for a spy.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I think you just might have a gift for this gig.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Wait a minute. What are you holding?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Whoa, that a bomb switch?!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Kafka, lower the tower right now!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Whoa! It's burning!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hurry!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I forgot which one's which!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: And I kinda get the feeling these probably aren't gonna work anymore!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Oh, there we go! Should be this one!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Please! Please work!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: There!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: It's not moving! Is the thing broken?!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Robin, why are you doing this?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: It's going down!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Dagnabbit!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Whatever, I don't even remember when was the last time I was up there.
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Just need to have Randal make me a new one.
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Chief Barton, you...
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: I'm heading upstairs to see how those damned fools are doing with the clean-up work!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: What... What happened here?!
attributes.name: Jailer A

attributes.content: What in the name of... What's going on here?!
attributes.name: Barton

attributes.content: Hold onto something, Kafka!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony, over there! Robin's gonna get thrown into the elevator!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hold on tight, Robin!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Why...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Save it for later!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Get ready!
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Anthony, you and Robin okay?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I'm fine. I got Robin.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Seems like the whole prison's power went out. It's pitch dark here.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: This is an opportunity for us.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: It feels like the tower crashed straight through the floor.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: We're probably at the second floor basement. Still some distance away from the clinic.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Right, we should get going before the jailers get here.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Robin, are you okay?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I-Is it really a good thing that I'm okay?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: It is.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Don't let it get to you.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I did tell you before you could keep trying to kill me.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: If you think you betrayed me for what you did, let me tell you this
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I'm afraid none of us are close enough to talk about trust just yet.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Heh, not even me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Not even you.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Oh, come on, that's cold.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Wouldn't you say it's more problematic to completely trust a person after just a few months?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Of course, I am a little disappointed, but that's all.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Nonetheless, I'm curious. I can tell you weren't acting when we were working together. You can't fake those emotions.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Why did you do this, Robin?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: My father. He made lots of money, and he was nice to me. I'm proud of him.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But one day, his company went bankrupt.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: And he's been a failure ever since.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: So he changed. He started drinking a lot, and he got angry. He hated everything around him.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: My mother left him. He was heavily in debt, and in the end, went into the hospital with liver problems, and so many other complications I don't even get the details of.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: My mother tried to talk me into moving in with her.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But I never forgot how well my father used to treat me.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I wanted to do something for him. So I gave up my hobbies. I tried taking on all kinds of jobs, but the medical bills kept coming.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Then, one day, someone came to me. He said he could give me lots of money. I just had to kill someone for him.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: And I'm the target.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I see. I can't offer you anything, and that's why you made this choice.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: No, he's been watching you here, dressed as a jailer. His name is Jesselton.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: After you made me the offer, he found me and told me
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: The very last thing that the Simons did was destroy my father's company.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: My goodness.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: In that case, not only should I not hold this against you, I must apologize.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: No, don't apologize. That isn't what I'm trying to say.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: It's not like that, Anthony.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I knew I was doin' wrong. I knew I shouldn't do it.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But I gave up.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I didn't know what I was supposed to do, otherwise. I just didn't know.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'm tired. My mother wanted me to make a choice, my father wanted me to make a choice, life wanted me to make a choice, Jesselton wanted me to make a choice, and even you wanted me to make a choice.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I don't wanna make any choices. I don't wanna judge what's right or what's wrong, good or bad. I just don't want to.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'm sick of it! Why do I have to choose?!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But, you know, Robin, you can't just hand off your decisions.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You have to think everything through and make your own choices. Then, you need to take responsibility for each of those choices.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Otherwise, you'll never be able to take your fate into your own hands.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: This is the most important thing I've learned during my years here in prison.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Strength is important, and so is intelligence, but the most important trait of all is courage. The courage to make your own decisions and pay the price for them.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I'm afraid of making wrong decisions myself, but I can't let that get in the way of making decisions at all.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I used to think I had no one to rely on because I hadn't found anyone reliable, but I've come to realize there is no one we can truly rely on anywhere in this world.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: No one but ourselves.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I'm sorry I didn't notice your pain in time, Robin.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I must reiterate. What you've done almost ruined my escape plan. That's why I won't forgive you so easily.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Nonetheless, as someone who has suffered a similar situation, I hope you can forget about all this for the time being.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You must scrutinize yourself and think about what it is that you want to do.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: What it is... that I want to do...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Domma's room is right up ahead. You have all the time you need to think.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I understand if you don't completely trust me, but I told Jesselton everything about your plan. He's definitely waiting for you somewhere up ahead.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Oh, you don't hafta worry about finding me. I've been waiting for you right here.
It's coming from Domma's room!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: You don't mean...?!
attributes.name: Anthony
